留言內容: The wild flowers in this shirt are quite realistic, and overall very artistic. However, the size runs about a half size up. I would suggest sizing down if you can. The material is thin- I would prefer a thicker material.  The sleeves on the shirt go all the way to my elbows which i wasn’t expecting. The green color is vibrant but is still a casual shirt. It took a couple weeks to arrive, so if you need this shirt stat, I would make sure to check the DELIVERY date.
